post.body: Sat AM? Have to line it up with Andrew. We've got some conflicting schedules w/ classes starting. You down?
Made the announcement earlier, yo! Subscribe to the RSS of the podcast section? We usually blast it on Twitter when we release.
Great idea and likely! Snow leopard as well.
Word. Regardless, you'll enjoy it. I made the switch in July and have been HOOKED since.
Interesting... It's also out of date! Episode 10 is up and live on my timeline. Ah well. Must be a different CA library.
Praying for the Nvidia Mac Mini tomorrow. Fingers crossed!
I have the same problem. Not sure what it is, but I can't help but get stomped when I first start playing.
Great purchase! Enjoy.
Appropriate adjective! What'd you think of it? Loved what little I played of IX. It's next in the queue!
You, my friend, are living the dream.
SKate 2 looks unreal. Can't wait.
You and I both. I have an absolute man-crush on Skate.
Epic. Pro or no?
Ha! How is it? I played the demo for 360 ages ago.
You'll see what I mean. Not a bad thing, for sure. Check episode 10 for details: http://tinyurl.com/7bh3cu
Loved the Gears 2 story. Good to hear!
Nice! Your thoughts on LO thus far? Things change on the 3rd and 4th disc.
LO is marginally better than LR. Discussion in Ep 10. Get on LO, dude! It's an excellent, though overlooked, RPG.
Any Gears 2 experience? How does R2 stack up against it?
Episode 10 is finally live! We're talkin' iTunes winners, GOTY, Xmas, JRPGs, Last Remnant, etc. Give a listen! - http://tinyurl.com/7bh3cu
